verses.text: But it came to pass, that when \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that we \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, he was \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*, and took \w great|strong="H7235"\w* \w indignation|strong="H3707"\w*, and \w mocked|strong="H3932"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

And he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w do|strong="H6213"\w* these \w feeble|strong="H0537"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*? will they \w fortify|strong="H5800"\w* themselves? will they \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*? will they make an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* in a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? will they \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* out of the \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w* of the \w rubbish|strong="H6083"\w* which are \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*?\f + \fr 4.2 \ft fortify…: Heb. leave to themselves\f*

Now \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* the \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* \add was\add* by \w him|strong="H0681"\w*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Even that which they \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, if a \w fox|strong="H7776"\w* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, he shall even break \w down|strong="H6555"\w* their \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for we are \w despised|strong="H0939"\w*: and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* their \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* upon their own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them for a \w prey|strong="H0961"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w captivity|strong="H7633"\w*:\f + \fr 4.4 \ft despised: Heb. despite\f*

And \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* not their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and let not their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* be blotted \w out|strong="H4229"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: for they have provoked \add thee\add* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* before the \w builders|strong="H1129"\w*.

So \w built|strong="H1129"\w* we the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*; and all the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* was joined \w together|strong="H7194"\w* unto the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* thereof: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* had a \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* to \w work|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ But it came to pass, \add that\add* when \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w*, and \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w*, and the \w Arabians|strong="H6163"\w*, and the \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*, and the \w Ashdodites|strong="H0796"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* were made \w up|strong="H0724"\w*, \add and\add* that the \w breaches|strong="H6555"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to be \w stopped|strong="H5640"\w*, then they were \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*, \f + \fr 4.7 \ft were made up: Heb. ascended\f*

And \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* all of them \w together|strong="H3162"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and to \w hinder|strong="H6213"\w* it.\f + \fr 4.8 \ft to hinder…: Heb. to make an error to it\f*

Nevertheless we made our \w prayer|strong="H6419"\w* unto our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* a \w watch|strong="H4929"\w* against them \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of them.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* of the bearers of \w burdens|strong="H5449"\w* is \w decayed|strong="H3782"\w*, and \add there is\add* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w rubbish|strong="H6083"\w*; so that we are not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

And our \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They shall not \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, neither \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, till we \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them, and \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* them, and cause the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.

And it came to pass, that when the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* by \w them|strong="H0681"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto us \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, From all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* whence ye shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto us \add they will be upon you\add*.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft From all…: or, That from all places ye must return to us\f*

¶ Therefore \w set|strong="H5975"\w* I in the \w lower|strong="H8482"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \add and\add* on the higher \w places|strong="H6706"\w*, I even \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* with their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*, their \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*, and their \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft in the…: Heb. from the lower parts of the place, etc\f*

And I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w*, and to the \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, and to the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Be not ye \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \add which is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* for your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and your \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.

And it came to pass, when our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that it was \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto us, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w brought|strong="H6565"\w* their \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* to \w nought|strong="H6565"\w*, that we \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* all of us to the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

And it came to pass from that \w time|strong="H3117"\w* forth, \add that\add* the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of my \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, and the other \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of them \w held|strong="H2388"\w* both the \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*, the \w shields|strong="H4043"\w*, and the \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*, and the \w habergeons|strong="H8302"\w*; and the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* \add were\add* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

They which \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, and they that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w burdens|strong="H5447"\w*, with those that \w laded|strong="H6006"\w*, \add every one\add* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, and with the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \add hand\add* \w held|strong="H2388"\w* a \w weapon|strong="H7973"\w*.

For the \w builders|strong="H1129"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* had his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w girded|strong="H0631"\w* by his \w side|strong="H4975"\w*, and \add so\add* \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*. And he that \w sounded|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \add was\add* by \w me|strong="H0681"\w*.\f + \fr 4.18 \ft by his side: Heb. on his loins\f*

¶ And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w*, and to the \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, and to the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, The \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H7235"\w* and \w large|strong="H7342"\w*, and we are \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* far \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*.

In what \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add therefore\add* ye \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, \w resort|strong="H6908"\w* ye thither unto us: our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* for us.

So we \w laboured|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*: and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of them \w held|strong="H2388"\w* the \w spears|strong="H7420"\w* from the \w rising|strong="H5927"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w* till the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* \w appeared|strong="H3318"\w*.

Likewise at the same \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Let every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* they may be a \w guard|strong="H4929"\w* to us, and \w labour|strong="H4399"\w* on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

So neither I, nor my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, nor my \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, nor the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H4929"\w* which \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* me, none of \w us|strong="H0587"\w* put \w off|strong="H6584"\w* our \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, \add saving that\add* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* put them \w off|strong="H7973"\w* for \w washing|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 4.23 \ft saving…: or, every one went with his weapon for water\f*
